channel.title: Money Making Ways
channel.description:
Are there any good money making ways out there?
-no merching -no account recovering...
Just sort of interested in seeing what there is out there.
Please include ways for those with absolutely no bank whatsoever.

item.title: Money Making Ways
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:17, topic:442171”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=544821.msg3994033#msg3994033 date=1337022735]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=544821.msg3994015#msg3994015 date=1337020942]

I like killing rev’s

I can make about 3m a night.
[/quote]WITH NO BANK

somebody give me good skill money making methods or something :s

You just need a whip and a salve amulet.
[/quote]I have the amulet already but no $$ for a whip trying to make that first 400k[/quote]
Addy scim 2k, few lobs like 1k super set like 3k anti d shield 500gp, green drags. Yes, I did this once all the way to full dragon(obviously buying better gear as I got more money) years ago when I lost bank(can’t remember how).
Shouldn’t take you more than 2 hours to get enough gps for a whip for sure.

Read full topic
